import React from'react';import{ListGroupItem}from'reactstrap';// import productImg from '../../../assets/images/product_01.1.jpg'
import'../../../styles/cart-item.css';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{cartActions}from'../../../store/shopping-cart/cartSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartItem=function CartItem(_ref){var item=_ref.item;var id=item.id,title=item.title,price=item.price,image01=item.image01,quantity=item.quantity,totalPrice=item.totalPrice;var dispatch=useDispatch();var incrementItem=function incrementItem(){dispatch(cartActions.addItem({id:id,title:title,price:price,image01:image01}));};var decreaseItem=function decreaseItem(){dispatch(cartActions.removeItem(id));};var deleteItem=function deleteItem(){dispatch(cartActions.deleteItem(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroupItem,{className:"border-0 cart__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart__item-info d-flex gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image01,alt:"product-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart__product-info d-flex align-items-center gap-4 justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"cart__product-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"d-flex align-items-center gap-5 cart__product-price",children:[quantity,"x ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",totalPrice]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between increase__decrease-btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"increase__btn",onClick:incrementItem,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-add-circle-fill"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"quantity",children:quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"decrease__btn",onClick:decreaseItem,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-subtract-line"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"delete__btn",onClick:deleteItem,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-close-circle-fill"})})]})]})});};export default CartItem;
